about_the_game:
A variety of independent monsters and NPCs make your exploration no longer boring!

Each region has unique monsters, with a total of about 160 different monsters!

There are more than 600 NPCs with different looks and personalities in the game! Let you no longer be boring during the exploration process!

                         ★★★★★★Core Gameplay Introduction★★★★★★

1. Bounty system

In addition to the main storyline, there are also various side quests. There are bounties in the Adventurer's Guild. During the exploration process, you will be able to obtain bounties or special items by finding and killing various vicious people or monsters.

2. Treasure Collection

There are all kinds of rare treasures hidden all over the world. Every time you collect one, you can exchange it for various rare items from specific NPCs.

3. Job transfer system

Job transfer requires a rare item, Sky Stone, which can be obtained through various channels in the adventure. Each initial job can be transferred to one of the three advanced jobs, each of which has unique skills and exclusive special attributes.

4. Treasure Map

There is an NPC in the game who sells treasure maps, and various surprises are waiting for you to dig!

5. Explore freely and collect artifacts

After you get your own ship and airship in the middle stage, the game becomes an open world, and you can freely search for the heroes' artifacts hidden all over the world.

6. Super Big World

There are four big worlds in total: the human world, the heavenly world, the alien world, and the demon world! The large and rich map design and various hidden locations make your exploration more exciting!

short_description: "Elemental Continent" is a nostalgic pixel-style JRPG game. You will play as a brave boy, meet various reliable partners during your journey, and face various powerful and insidious enemies together during the adventure. Come and explore this magical world!
